title: File Server
description: Serve a web application from a folder. This executor is a wrapper around the [http-server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/http-server) package.

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving `HTTPS`.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving `HTTPS`.

proxyUrl.description: URL to proxy unhandled requests to. _Note: If the 'spa' flag is set to true, manually setting this value will override the catch-all redirect functionality from http-server which may lead to unexpected behavior._

proxyOptions.description: Options for the proxy used by `http-server`.

spa.description: Redirect 404 errors to index.html (useful for SPA's)

staticFilePath.description: Path where the build artifacts are located. If not provided then it will be infered from the buildTarget executor options as outputPath

cacheSeconds.description: Set cache time (in seconds) for cache-control max-age header. To disable caching, use -1. Caching defaults to disabled.
